title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: Near it stand the ruins of the ancient castle of Tulliallan, for inerly the property of the knights of Bhickadder, and Tulliallan Castle, the residence of Baroness Keith and Count Flahault, built bj^ the late Admiral Lord Keith, the father of the present proprietrix, who is also the lineal representative of one of the most ancient families in Scotland — the Mercers of Aldie.
